short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and share lists of links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slinkist allows you to create lists of links which you can share with others or keep it for yourself. Using the chrome plugin you can add your current website you're visiting to your list for ease of sharing or keeping track of things.

If you ever get tired of copying and pasting different links while you're online shopping or other, Slinkist makes it easy to group all your items and have them viewable via a single, sharable link!
